amendment.description: Providing for the use of State funds for projects to protect existing roadways from anticipated flooding of a closed basin lake.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3219 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3219 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S5838; text: CR S5838) Providing for the use of State funds for projects to protect existing roadways from anticipated flooding of a closed basin lake.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3219 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3219 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Inhofe.
